name: Alone in the Sea
description:
You are Alone and you need to survive in this sea. 

This game is created for the Ludum Dare 42. The theme is "Running out of space"

--- Controls ---

  • Q & D for moving
  • Space for jump
  • Left mouse for fire

--- Changelog ---

Alone in the sea v1.1 

  • Jump on the key down (and not on the key up)
  • Border map locked
